org.apache.hama.ipc

Class AsyncServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.ipc.AsyncServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncRPC.NioServer

    public abstract class AsyncServer
extends Object
    An abstract IPC service using netty. IPC calls take a single Writable as a parameter, and return a Writable*
    See Also:
    AsyncServer

      Nested Classes

      class  AsyncServer.NioFrameDecoder
      This class dynamically accumulate the recieved data by the value of the length field in the message

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncServer

        protected AsyncServer(String bindAddress,
           int port,
           Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> paramClass,
           int handlerCount,
           org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
               throws IOException
        Constructs a server listening on the named port and address. Parameters passed must be of the named class. The handlerCount determines the number of handler threads that will be used to process calls.
        Parameters:
        bindAddress -
        port -
        paramClass -
        handlerCount -
        conf -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getAddress

        public InetSocketAddress getAddress()
        Getting address
        Returns:
        InetSocketAddress

      • get

        public static AsyncServer get()
        Returns the server instance called under or null. May be called under #call(Writable, long) implementations, and under Writable methods of paramters and return values. Permits applications to access the server context.
        Returns:
        NioServer

        public void start()
        start server listener
